Summary: I WAS LOOKING WEST FROM I-95 WEST BOUND LANTANA RD
divs: Sighting DetailsMY WIFE WAS WITH ME IN OUR CHEVY EXPRESS WORK VAN ,BIG WINDSHIELD,SUN WAS GOING DOWN. THE SKY WAS PERFECT BLUE NO CLOUDS EXCEPT ONE HORIZONTAL CLOUD FORMATION . THE CLOUD WAS ALMOST RECTANGULAR DISC ,ESTIMATE 1000 FEET SPAN . I WAS PROBLY 10-15 MILES AWAY, BOTH OF US STARING AT IT STOPED AT A RED LIGHT CONGRESS AND LANTANA RD.I NOTICED IT MOVING PERFECTLY SMOOTH LIKE, NORTH TO SOUTH. THIS CLOUD WAS SMOKEY WHITE COLORED MOVING ALL ALONE. I COULDNT HELP MY SELF AND ROLLED DOWN MY WINDOW AND CALLED OUT TO OTHER DRIVERS. I ALSO CALLED 911 AND SAID THIS IS NO APRIL FOOLS JOKE I MAY HAVE SEEN A UFO. THE POLICE LADY DISPATCHED NOTIFIED AIR PORT TOWERS WEST PALM BEACH AND LANTANA AND CALLED ME BACK ON MY CELL AND SAID NO ONE HAS SPOTTED THIS FORMATION,BUT BY THIS TOOK PLACE THIS VERY REFINED LOOKING CLOUD WAS OUT OF SIGHT.I DO HAVE TO SAY IT LOOKS THE SAME AS THE DOG ISLAND PHOTO,EXCEPT MINE WAS HORIZONTALLY MOVING ME AND MY WIFE BOTH BELIEVE THIS WAS A VERY STRANGE EVENT AND NEEDS EXPLANATION.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lantana
There were no other sightings in Lantana on or around April 1st 2011
